sect2.title: iDifferencesymbol>)
sect2.para: minus is the parser recognized symbol for this operator. The minus operator is similar to the other relational binary operators. minus returns a table (or presentation) that has all of the rows in the table specified by the first operand that are not the same as any row in the table specified by the second operand. A row is considered to be the same only if the data in all of the requested columns are the same.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: select Employee minus (TableDee add { 67 ID, "Joe" Name } );
ID Name -- ---- 1 Joe 2 John 3 Josh 4 Jeff 5 Jake 6 Jeff
